changes_m.title: Tech upgrade
changes_m.description: This is boring update, but a big one. I hit the wall in terms of being able to make reliable changes to the large spread of JS. Methods with parameters being changed wouldn't give errors etc. and massive time sinks with having to run up everything every time i wanted to test small changes. NO MORE! moved to typescript and away from modules. This was my choice, others may go for other solutions, but this is my comfort spot. While i was at it i also updated the styling to SCSS and the code and styles are now compiled and transpiled to single files. WHOOP.
changes_m.impact: Life will be easier, and changes and updates will go out faster and with less issues.
